mainHero.title: Manufacturing of chemical products for coatings and construction.
mainHero.description: KAZ CHEMICALS is a manufacturer and supplier of acrylic dispersions, cellulose ethers, and chemical additives.

task.label: Task
task.title: Development of a washable paint formulation
task.text: The client required the development of a water-based paint formulation for children's facilities with increased resistance to abrasion and repeated washing.

problem.label: Problem
problem.title: Development of a washable paint formulation
problem.text: Standard dispersions did not provide the required level of adhesion to the substrate and resistance to detergents after film formation.

solution.label: Solution
solution.title: Development of a washable paint formulation
solution.text: KAZ CHEMICALS specialists proposed a combination of a special acrylic dispersion AD-75W with high hiding power and a modifying additive MA-12. An optimal formulation was selected, and the paint successfully passed all wet abrasion resistance tests.

hero.title: About KAZ CHEMICALS
hero.text: KAZ CHEMICALS is a reliable manufacturer and supplier of high-quality raw materials for the coatings, construction, and chemical industries. We specialize in the supply of acrylic dispersions, cellulose ethers (HPMC), and a wide range of functional additives. Our mission is to provide partners with products that enhance production efficiency and the quality of finished goods, combining innovation, stability, and technical expertise.

card.title: KAZ CHEMICALS
card.p1: Manufacturer and supplier of raw materials for the coatings, construction, and chemical industries.
card.p2: Operating since 2010. Main warehouses and the logistics center are located in (please specify your city/region).
card.p3: The company specializes in the supply of high-quality acrylic dispersions, cellulose ethers (HPMC), and functional additives.
card.p4: KAZ CHEMICALS has technical expertise to select products according to customer needs and ensure consistent supply quality.

items.text: Establishment of KAZ CHEMICALS. Start of chemical raw material supplies to the local market.
Expansion of the product range by adding acrylic dispersions for coatings. Establishment of partnerships with the first major paint manufacturers.
Launch of cellulose ether (HPMC) supplies for the construction industry. Investments in warehouse capacity.
Development of a functional additives line (dispersants, thickeners, biocides). Formation of a complete product portfolio.
Creation of a technical department and laboratory for product testing and customer support.
Modernization of the logistics system. Expansion to nationwide supply operations.
Launch of a program for developing customized solutions and formulations tailored to key customer requests.

items.label: invested in logistics and warehouse capacity

acrylic.description: KAZ CHEMICALS acrylic dispersions are the foundation for producing high-quality coating materials. They provide excellent adhesion, water resistance, UV resistance, and long-term durability. Used in the production of exterior and interior paints, primers, impregnations, and protective coatings.

applications.title: Exterior paints
applications.text: Acrylic dispersions give exterior paints resistance to weathering, abrasion, and contamination, ensuring long service life and color brightness.

applications.title: Water-based interior paints
applications.text: Used to create environmentally friendly, fast-drying paints with good hiding power and resistance to wet abrasion.

applications.title: Primers and impregnations
applications.text: Dispersions provide deep penetration, substrate reinforcement, and improved adhesion for subsequent finishing layers.

hpmc.title: Cellulose ethers (HPMC)
hpmc.description: Hydroxypropyl methylcellulose (HPMC) from KAZ CHEMICALS is an essential component in construction chemistry. It acts as a thickener, water-retention agent, and rheology modifier. It improves workability, prevents segregation, and increases adhesion.

applications.title: Dry construction mixes
applications.text: HPMC is used in tile adhesives, plasters, putties, and self-leveling floors to control viscosity and water absorption.

applications.title: Adhesive formulations
applications.text: Provides adhesives with the required thixotropy, increases open time, and improves final bond strength.

applications.title: Coatings and paints
applications.text: In paints, HPMC acts as a thickener and stabilizer, prevents splashing, and improves application properties.

additives.title: Specialty additives
additives.description: We offer a wide range of functional additives for coatings and construction mixes. Our products help solve specific tasks: from pigment dispersion and defoaming to providing special properties such as increased hydrophobicity or bioprotection.

applications.title: Dispersants and wetting agents
applications.text: Additives for uniform distribution of pigments and fillers in the system, improving tinting strength and coating stability.

applications.title: Thickeners and rheology modifiers
applications.text: Control viscosity and material behavior during application, preventing sagging on vertical surfaces.

applications.title: Biocidal additives
applications.text: Protect coatings and construction mixes from mold, fungi, and algae.

countries.accent: We supply not just chemicals, but a guarantee of durability for the country’s strategic projects.

hero.title: Acrylic dispersions for coatings
hero.description: KAZ CHEMICALS acrylic dispersions are high-quality water-based polymer systems that serve as the foundation for modern, environmentally friendly, and highly efficient coatings. They provide excellent adhesion to various surfaces and form a strong, elastic, and weather-resistant film. Our products are used in the production of paints, primers, impregnations, and protective coatings for the construction, industrial, and woodworking industries.

cta.title: Product selection
cta.subtitle: Acrylic dispersions and additives by KAZ CHEMICALS

items.title: Exterior paints
items.description: Our dispersions provide exterior paints with exceptional resistance to UV radiation, temperature fluctuations, moisture, and contamination. They ensure long-lasting coatings, preserving color and film integrity for many years. Ideal for projects with high climatic resistance requirements.

items.title: Water-based interior paints
items.description: KAZ CHEMICALS dispersions enable the production of low-VOC paints that are safe for health. They provide excellent hiding power, smooth application, good resistance to wet abrasion (wet cleaning), and fast drying. Suitable for residential, office, and public spaces.
products: Acrylic dispersion for interior use AD-30I

items.title: Primers and impregnations
items.description: Special formulations based on our dispersions strengthen loose and friable substrates (plaster, concrete, drywall), bind dust, and significantly improve adhesion of finishing coatings. They reduce surface absorbency, allowing paint savings.

hero.title: Cellulose ethers (HPMC) for construction and industry
hero.description: Hydroxypropyl methylcellulose (HPMC) by KAZ CHEMICALS is a highly efficient modifier indispensable in the production of dry construction mixes, coatings, adhesives, and food industry products. Our HPMC acts as a thickener, water-retention agent, stabilizer, and adhesion enhancer. It ensures good workability of mixes, prevents segregation, extends open time, and increases the final strength of products.

cta.title: Product selection
cta.subtitle: Cellulose ethers and additives by KAZ CHEMICALS

items.title: Dry construction mixes
items.description: HPMC is a key component in plasters, putties, tile adhesives, self-leveling floors, and masonry mortars. It regulates water demand, prevents rapid moisture evaporation (important for cement hydration), improves plasticity, and prevents sagging on vertical surfaces.

items.title: Adhesive formulations
items.description: In cement-, gypsum-, or PVA-based adhesives, HPMC provides thixotropy — easy application without dripping. It increases open time for tile or wallpaper adjustment, improves adhesion to substrates, and reduces the risk of void formation. Used in tile, wallpaper, and монтаж adhesives.
products: Modified HPMC for heavy tiles HPMC-90H

items.title: Coatings and paints
items.description: In water-dispersed paints and primers, HPMC functions as a thickener and stabilizer. It provides the required viscosity for brush or roller application, prevents splashing and pigment sedimentation, and improves paint leveling and consistency.

hero.title: Specialty additives for coatings and construction mixes
hero.description: KAZ CHEMICALS offers a wide range of highly effective functional additives that address specific challenges in the production of coatings and construction mixes. Our products help improve manufacturing processes, formulation stability, and the final properties of finished products — from pigment dispersion and rheology control to bioprotection and enhanced performance characteristics.

items.name: Universal dispersant–wetting agent DD-101
items.description: A multifunctional additive for efficient dispersion and wetting of pigments and fillers in water-based systems. Reduces dispersion time, increases color intensity and gloss, and prevents reflocculation.

items.title: Dispersants and wetting agents
items.description: Critically important at the paint and enamel production stage. Our DD-series additives ensure complete and uniform distribution of solid particles (pigments, fillers) in liquid media. This improves tinting strength, storage stability, gloss, and color uniformity. Used in the production of interior, exterior, and industrial paints.

items.title: Thickeners and rheology
items.description: ZG-series additives allow precise control of viscosity and rheological properties. They impart thixotropy to paints and construction mixes — the material does not drip from brushes or rollers and does not sag on vertical surfaces, yet remains easy to apply. They also prevent splashing and pigment sedimentation.

items.title: Biocidal additives
items.description: Protect water-based systems (paints, primers, construction mixes) from the growth of bacteria, fungi, and mold both during storage of the finished product and in the formed film or coating during service. Especially important for formulations used in high-humidity conditions.

email.note: for technical questions and formulation support

hero.title: Laboratory and technical support by KAZ CHEMICALS
hero.description: Our technical center is the foundation of KAZ CHEMICALS’ expertise and quality. We do not simply supply products — we ensure their full compliance with customer requirements and help solve complex technological challenges. The laboratory is equipped with modern equipment for raw material testing, quality control of finished products, and the development of customized solutions.

items.text: Analysis of raw materials and components supplied for production
Analysis of new products presented on the market
Ongoing quality control of manufactured products
Development of new formulations or optimization of existing ones to meet specific customer requirements
Compatibility testing of materials within cable product structures
Conducting standard tests of polymer compounds and cables using these materials

research.title: List of conducted research and services

categories.title: Analysis of dispersed systems
items: Particle size distribution analysis (laser diffraction, sieve analysis)
Specific surface area measurement of powders
Oil absorption and moisture content determination
pH and electrical conductivity measurement of aqueous dispersions

categories.title: Thermal and climatic analysis
items: Cyclic temperature and humidity exposure tests

categories.title: Testing for coatings and construction mixes
items: Measurement of hiding power and drying time of paints
Adhesion evaluation of coatings to various substrates
Cracking and water resistance testing of construction compositions
Determination of pot life (working time) of mixes

categories.title: Specialized analyses
items: Biological resistance testing (mold and fungi exposure)
Chemical resistance testing to oils, solvents, and alkalis
Selection of pigment pastes and dispersion quality evaluation
